entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TestWorkspaceDiagnosticsWaitsForLspTextChangesWithMultipleSources failed in CI #74342
  • null flow error where bang operator does not bypass null error #74333
  • Avoid recommending get-only properties without valid settable options in object initializer #74331
  • Avoid recommending synthesizing record parameters in static context within the record #74327
  • TypedConstant.ToCSharpString/ToVisualBasicString should exclude bitwise or value of 0 #74326
  • Ref safety error with enumerators #74325
    17.12

Closed

  • Remove compat workaround for interceptors file path lookup. #72265
    17.12
  • Building a .NET 7 RC1 Project with VS Causing CS8032 #64243
  • Simple switch vs ternary: should IL code be the same? #70886
  • Support XAML LSP in vscode #69471
    18.0
  • Unexpected behavior when using ref structs in foreach loop #73741
    17.12
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35109.94 #74324

PullRequests

Created

  • Tests to verify ref safety bug fix #74341
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove 'open file only' concept from analyzer driver #74340
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Do not use memory mapped files on non-windows #74339
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add a ParamCollection test which uses the attribute included in .NET 9 SDK #74338
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Always check get method parameters in override indexer #74337
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove fallbacks and providers (4) #74336
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge Internal/release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.8 #74335
  • Handle missing System.Nullable type #74330
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Update VSSDK #74329
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge Internal/release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.10 #74334
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Overload Resolution Priority #74190
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority, Next
  • Fixed grammar in incremental-generators.cookbook.md #74279
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Remove fallbacks (2) #74319
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix modification of readonly locals through ref fields #74255
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid more large string constant fields #74307
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Move determination of language for an LSP request into the serialized queue to avoid race #74300
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix typos in Roslyn-Overview.md #74059
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Revert "Remove semantic model keep-alive code in completion (#73844)" #74302
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Use correct get / set inside ref safety analysis #73842
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Disable saving source texts to memory mapped files on non-Windows platforms #73628
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [WIP] Migrate Codelens provider to .NET #74321
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove fallbacks (3) #74323
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix layering of Implement-Interface code-fixer vs language service #74320
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Extension type erasure #74313
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged
  • Smart Rename: Provide additional context for renamed symbol #73873
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Switch implicit span to conversion from type #74232
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Optimize codegen for collections expression of single spread of `ReadOnlySpan` for collection builder emit strategy #73102
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, untriaged
  • Work around MSBuild task ordering bug #74205
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve error recovery for null coalescing assignment operator #74218
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Do not mark 2 first `int` parameters of an interpolated string handler constructor as unused #74064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Note that toolset package layout is hard-coded in SDK #74301
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
